feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: He paused in hopes of an answer: but his companion was not disposed to make any; and Elizabeth at that instant moving towards them, he was struck with the notion of doing a very gallant thing, and called out to her,--

causedBy.name: Observing Mr. Bingley's attention to her sister

feels.exactPlace: At Sir William Lucas’s, where a large party were assembled.

feels.name: Indifference
feels.quote: He listened to her with perfect indifference, while she chose to entertain herself in this manner; and as his composure convinced her that all was safe, her wit flowed along.
feels.exactPlace: At a gathering where Miss Bingley entertained herself

feels.name: Coolness
feels.quote: After listening one morning to their effusions on this subject, Mr. Bennet coolly observed,--

feels.name: Discomposure
feels.quote: Indeed, sir, I have not the least intention of dancing. I entreat you not to suppose that I moved this way in order to beg for a partner.

causedBy.name: Being asked to dance by Sir William Lucas

feels.exactPlace: At Sir William Lucas’s, where a large party were assembled.

feels.name: Archness
feels.quote: Elizabeth looked archly, and turned away.

causedBy.name: Being complimented by Sir William Lucas

feels.exactPlace: At a gathering where Sir William Lucas complimented her

Places.name: At Sir William Lucas’s, where a large party were assembled.
